item.title: CVE-2023-4600|2023-08-30T11:29:28.920Z -- affiliatewp -- affiliatewp
item.description: The AffiliateWP for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'affwp_activate_addons_page_plugin' function called via an AJAX action in versions up to, and including, 2.14.0. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to activate arbitrary plugins.
